personal.name: Ashutosh Dash
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: Passionate developer building modern web applications with cutting-edge technologies. Specializing in React, Next.js, and cloud-native solutions.

experience.description: Leading development of scalable web applications using React and Node.js. Mentoring junior developers and implementing best practices.
Developed and maintained multiple client projects. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.
Built responsive web applications and learned modern development practices. Contributed to team projects and code reviews.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management tool with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience with modern UI/UX design.

freelance.title: Available for Freelance Projects
freelance.description: I'm currently accepting new freelance opportunities. Whether you need a complete web application, API development, or consultation, I'd love to hear about your project.

reviews.review: Ashutosh delivered exceptional work on our platform. His technical expertise and attention to detail made the project a huge success.
Working with Ashutosh was a great experience. He's professional, reliable, and always delivers quality code on time.
Ashutosh helped us build our MVP quickly and efficiently. His problem-solving skills and dedication are outstanding.
